component.name: MWeather
component.summary: Modern weather widget with Google icons and detailed forecasts

description.p: A stunning, responsive weather widget designed for KDE Plasma 6. It features smooth morphing animations, multiple data providers (Open-Meteo, OpenWeatherMap, WeatherAPI), and a detail-rich expandable interface.

ul.li: Adaptive layout: Small, Wide, and Large modes.
Morphing details animation for an immersive experience.
Includes 3 variations of Google Weather style icon packs.

screenshot.caption: The Large Mode dashboard with detailed forecast
